historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-3401.5.

DC CODE § 47-3401.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The term "Authority" means the District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Authority established under § 47- 391.01(a);
The term "control period" has the meaning given such term under § 47- 393(4);
The term "District government" has the meaning given such term under § 47-393(5);
The term "financial plan and budget" has the meaning given such term under § 47-393(6); and
The term "Secretary" means the Secretary of the Treasury.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
